messages.message: Youth Teams
Enable youth teams. Users can scout for new youth players and hire them for their professional team.
Users can scout for new talents.
Users can post and accept match requests.
Salary per strength point
Amount of salary per match and per strength point.
Minimum age for professional team
Break between scouting executions
in hours; Only after this many hours after a scouting execution, a user can execute another scouting. 0 for no break.
Professional contract matches
Number of contract matches when a youth player is moved to professional team.
Professional strength: Technique
%; when a youth player is moved to professional team.
Professional strength: Stamina
Professional strength: Freshness
Professional strength: Satisfaction
Scouting: Chance of success
per cent; Probability that a scout will find any new talent (indeoendent from player strength).
Scouting: Minimum player strength
per cent; How strong a scouted player must be at least.
Scouting: Höchstspielerstärke
per cent; How strong a scouted player must be at maximum.
Scouting: Standard deviation
per cent; How much the actual player strength shall deviate from the calculated strength. 0 for no deviation.
Scouting: Minimum age
Match requests: Max. number per team
Maximum number of unanswered open match requests per team.
Match requests: Days in future
Up to how many days in future a match request can be placed.
Match requests: Allowed times
separated by comma (e.g. '14:00,17:00'). In order to prevent overstressing of the server if there were also league matches at the same time.
Match requests: Latest approval
in hours; Up to how many hours in advance a match request can be approved. Shall give the opportunity to participants to set their tactics.
Max. number of allowed matches per day per team
Strength change: Very good performance
Change of player strength in points if mark in match is 1.3 or better.
Strength change: Good performance
Change of player strength in points if mark in match is between 1.4 and 2.3.
Strength change: Bad performance
Change of player strength in points if mark in match is between 4.3 and 5.
Strength change: Very bad performance
Change of player strength in points if mark in match is worse than 5.
Youth players' maximum age
Youth players who become this age or are older will be deleted.
